title: What is your favorite Taylor Swift Red song? - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to say All too well but that would be unfair to rest of her songs…cuz every song in the album has got it's own meaning and feeling and it's pointless to pick a favourite outta them. It all depends on my mood… when I'm happy I prefer listening stay stay stay, starlight, holyground or may be 22. And when I'm in not-so-good mood I usually play sad beautiful tragic, treacherous, or I almost do. Well, these days I keep playing state of grace (acoustic version ) on repeat… so deep and calm. It's melody works like a lulaby to me. It's like she's singing live… that too in my ears!!  P.S. This is my version of state of grace. I sang this on smule sing quite a while ago and it's nothing like hers version… but I did my best!! ^_^ State of grace acoustic on Sing! Karaoke | Smule

Hard to choose one favorite song from the Red album though.. My choices goes this way: Best music - I knew you were Trouble.Best lyrics - Begin Again.Best videos- 22 and We are never ever getting back together.She had many hits from this album and i’m sure every single swiftie fell in love with beautiful concerts of Red and OC her outfits…  And Red everywhere…:)
